title: Abu Dhabi Grand Prix: F1 title decider – live
summary: Lando Norris, Max Verstappen, and Oscar Piastri are set to compete fiercely for the championship at Yas Marina Circuit. Niall McVeigh will provide live updates on the unfolding action. Excitement builds as the title contenders face off.

title: Brighton v West Ham: Premier League – live
summary: Brighton aims to boost their position in the league by securing a win against West Ham at the Amex Stadium. Daniel Harris will provide live updates during the match. Fans are eager to see if Brighton can continue their ascent in the table.

title: Manchester United v West Ham, Tottenham v Aston Villa, and more: WSL clockwatch – live
summary: Dominic Booth will provide updates on five upcoming fixtures in the Women’s Super League. Fans can look forward to the latest news and developments as the matches unfold. Stay tuned for real-time coverage and insights.

title: Premier League buildup, FA Cup second round updates, and more – as it happened
summary: Get ready for the upcoming FA Cup matches featuring Brighton vs. West Ham and Fulham vs. Crystal Palace. Coverage will also include updates from Scottish and European football. Join our writers for insights and analysis leading up to the games.

title: Admired British photographer Martin Parr dies aged 73
summary: Parr described his vibrant and meticulously detailed depictions of British life as "disguised as entertainment." His unique approach resonated with audiences, leading to widespread popularity. The success highlights the appeal of his artistic perspective on everyday life.
